mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seat (user_id, reservation_id, gender, depart, arrive, seat) VALUES (#{userId}, #{reservation_id}, #{gender}, #{depart}, #{arrive}, #{seat});
mapper.select: SELECT seat FROM seat WHERE reservation_id = #{rid}
